ogbomosho.name: Ogbomoso
ogbomosho.description: Designers unite through shared passion for creativity and innovation, exchanging ideas that push boundaries. Together they critique, collaborate, and elevate each other's work beyond individual limitations.
ogbomosho.content:
dSandBox is a global design community ecosystem created to empower designers through creativity, connection, and collaboration.


We bring designers together – from students to professionals - to learn, share ideas, and grow collectively through community events, workshops, and creative challenges.


Starting from Ogbomoso, Nigeria, one of the fastest-rising tech and innovation hubs in the South-West, dSandBox is building local communities that connect to a larger global network of designers.

ogbomoso-design-fest.title: Ogbomoso Design Fest
ogbomoso-design-fest.description: Hands-on sessions with industry experts to sharpen your design skills and learn new techniques.

ogbomoso-design-fest-2.title: Ogbomoso Design Fest
ogbomoso-design-fest-2.description: Get constructive feedback on your portfolio from experienced designers and hiring managers.

ogbomoso-design-fests.title: Ogbomoso Design Fests
ogbomoso-design-fests.description: Connect with fellow designers, developers, and creatives in your local community.

ogbomoso-design-summit.title: Ogbomoso Design Fest
ogbomoso-design-summit.description: Work on real-world projects with team members and build your experience together.
